title: Turkey
directions: Combine all brine ingredients except turkey and water to a stockpot and bring to boil while stirring.
Cool to room temperature and refrigerate.
Add brine, water, and turkey to a giant covered bucket and set in a cool area for 6 hours.
Turn turkey over at the 3 hour mark.
Rinse turkey of brine, pat dry with paper towels and place on a roasting rack.
In a glass bowl combine apple, onion, cinnamon stick and a cup of water and microwave for 5 mins.
Coat turkey with oil and shove all stuffing ingredients inside it's cavity
Roast at 500° on the loweset rack in an oven for 30 mins.
Cover turkey breast with foil and cook at 350° until the turkey reaches 160°.
Let turkey rest still covered for 15 mins.
